FuncDef:
The sbfd command enables Seamless Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (SBFD) globally and displays the SBFD session view.
The undo sbfd command disables SBFD globally.
By default, SBFD is disabled globally.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
SBFD is a simplified BFD mechanism. If a fault occurs in a large-scale negotiation scenario, SBFD quickly detects the fault and notifies an upper-layer application of the fault.
Prerequisites
BFD has been globally enabled using the bfd command in the system view.
Precautions
If SBFD has been enabled, you must disable SBFD before disabling BFD.
Running the undo sbfd command will delete all SBFD sessions. Exercise caution when running the reset bfd statistics command.
